a little fox in a strange world  the art is cute the animations are detailed and smooth the maps are really wellmade and welldesigned the music is amazing the gameplay is wonderful the combat is wellmade and satisfying and its difficulty can be turned down if needed and there are secrets and story and connections buried in everything many not intended for players to discover  the world is rich and as deep as you are willing to delve  highly recommend
